Name: batch_size_grokking
Title: Batch Size Grokking: Assessing the impact of the training batchsize on the grokking phenomenon
Experiment: Modify the experiments to dynamically adjust the batch size during training, starting with a small batch size and gradually increasing it. This could potentially lead to faster generalization on the validation set.

Name: architecture_grokking
Title: Architectural Grokking: Exploring the impact of neural network architectures on grokking phenomenon
Experiment: Modify the existing experiment script to include additional neural network architectures such as RNNs, CNNs, and MLPs. Implement these architectures in place of the current Transformer model in the 'Transformer' class and compare the grokking behavior across these models. Evaluate each model's performance on the same datasets and track the learning dynamics and generalization performance across time.
